Entry in the Commercial Register.\nRegister court: District Court Bielefeld\nRegister number: HRB 41373

Net IT by Hiscox, Territorial validity: worldwide

mindbit GmbH is an IT company from the region of East Westphalia with more than 13 years experience in the IT industry. Our services contain IT consulting & business analysis, mobile app development, software programming and IT full service. We are specialized to support our customers through all stages of a project. From requirements analysis to roll out, we are there for you as a developer and consultant. In addition to individual projects, we also offer in-house software and the associated service.

Respect and appreciation are our central values concerning the relationships to our customers, partners and employees. We see annual sales growth and are proud of the ever-growing number of employees and customer projects.
For technical questions regarding the Rubbellos app, you can always contact the following address:
Registered office / register court: Bielefeld\nRegister court: Companies House Cardiff, Nr. 09372672\nRegister number: B 41909

Through years of service to retailers, restaurateurs and purchasing associations, DiK Ltd. (Deutsches Institut für Kassiertechnologie) has extensive experience in POS technology and e-payment. As a competent partner for all topics around the point of sale, our company has a focus on consulting and solution implementations. Due to current developments and the currently high demand for information and advice in the area of cashless payment, we concentrate on finding the best opportunities for our customers to act more cost-efficient.
Analyze, advise and exploit potential savings, with close consultation with our customers - that\'s what we have specialized in.

For this, we check your current conditions and the technical data. Once we have completed the analysis, you will receive a plan for optimization in order to act more efficient and cost-saving. In addition, we support you at all times comprehensively with the technical implementation and the introduction of innovations.
If you have any questions about the Clover terminal, you can always contact the following address:
Deutsches Institut für Kassiertechnologie ltd.\nMeisenstr. 65\n33607 Bielefeld
Data Privacy Policy for the End-User of the Rubbellos App

In order to provide services, we would like to provide you with this Privacy Policy to let you know how we collect, manage and what are your rights concerning this information. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the services.

This Privacy Policy applies only to the Rubbellos App and not to other applications. With these guidelines we inform you about the extent to which we collect data, how long they are stored and for what purpose your data is passed on to third parties.

When using the Rubbellos App personal data is collected (first name, name and e-mail address). Your information will not be shared, rented or sold to third parties without your consent. With the consent of the Privacy Policy, you confirm your consent to use the data you provide at a later date for any advertising.
On request, your personal data can be deleted at any time. Just contact us in person or by e-mail.
Changes to the Privacy Policy of Rubbellos App

Rubbellos App\'s Privacy Policy may change from time to time as a result of legal changes and adjustments to require the implementation of your privacy rights. We will inform you of any changes by e-mail.
